title: Chainlink External Adapter for Uniswap V2
description: This adapter allows querying Uniswap V2 contracts

ETHEREUM_RPC_URL.description: An http(s) RPC URL to a blockchain node that can read the UniswapV2 contracts

ROUTER_CONTRACT.description: The uniswap router address to get price from. NOTE: THIS SHOULD NOT BE CHANGED ON ETHEREUM MAINNET

BLOCKCHAIN_NETWORK.description: The network to get pre-defined token addresses from. NOTE: THIS SHOULD NOT BE CHANGED ON ETHEREUM MAINNET
